Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_3D_sample_effects_level

The function AIL_3D_sample_effects_level retrieves the current effects level of the given sample.

F32 AIL_3D_sample_effects_level(
  H3DSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to query.

Returns

The current room effects level for the sample from no effects at all (0.0) to full room effects (1.0).

Discussion

On most providers, setting the room type to ENVIRONMENT_GENERIC will turn off all room effects. On the EAX providers, however, you still need to call this AIL_set_3D_sample_effects_level to completely turn off all room effects.

Example files that use this function: EXAM3D.C


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_room_type, AIL_set_3D_sample_effects_level
Related Basic Types: F32, H3DSAMPLE, MILES_ROOM_TYPE
